Create a ggnetwork data frame from an igraph object

Source: R/network_reconstruction_and_analysis.R
igraph2ggnetwork.Rd

Create a ggnetwork data frame from an igraph object

igraph2ggnetwork(graph, layout = "kk", arrow.gap = 0.2)

Arguments

graph

Object of class igraph.
layout

Network layout. One of "dh", "drl", "gem", "lgl", "fr", "graphopt", "kk" and "mds". Default is "kk".
arrow.gap

Numeric indicating the distance between nodes and arrows. Default is 0.2

See also

ggnetwork layout_with_dh,layout_with_drl,layout_with_gem,layout_with_lgl,layout_with_fr,layout_with_graphopt,layout_with_kk,layout_with_mds

Author

Fabricio Almeida-Silva
